title: Person Of Interest Executive Producer Answers Burning Fan Questions Spoilers
author: POISuit
comment: Words can not describe how much I am going to miss this show.. :(
I'd honestly just watch a spinoff of this about John Reese's life

I can't believe that it has been five years... Found it by accident, loved the pilot, have been watching every episode since (most of the episodes more than once even). Perfect cast, perfect writing, perfect cinema photography, and the soundtrack. Oh, the soundtrack!

altho because they've cancelled one of the best Tv shows to ever grace the small screen, I will curb my hatred of CBS for only this reason:  They allowed the show's producers/writers and actors to give us fans closure......
This was such an amazing show!  Great writing and character development.
description: Following the series finale, POI Executive Producer Greg Plageman addresses lingering fan questions: Was the ending always planned? What's the fate of Samaritan? And what did the Team sacrifices mean?
